resources.string: Welcome to Google Calendar! \nA Google approach to managing your schedule built on the idea that scheduling events can be more intuitive, efficient and accessible.
Change all events in the series.
Change this and all future events.
No pictures are available on the phone.

Sync Exchange appointments to RoadSync Calendar application
Use secure data connection to server

This software may include technology that periodically, if an internet connection is available, contacts DataViz servers with information regarding your installed copy of the program and your handheld device. Data collected includes information regarding program product specifications, registration status, type and model of device, desktop operating system, and product usage patterns, including how often used. This information is used to notify you of free maintenance upgrades, product entitlements, new version releases and additional personalized services and offers. Any collected data may also be used for general statistical purposes on an anonymous basis. DataViz may also match your registration and/or product information to personally identifiable information in order to present you with product notifications, offers and invitations (surveys, beta programs, etc.) tailored to you. Thank you for your interest in RoadSync® by DataViz, Inc.

This application uses the Microsoft® Exchange ActiveSync® protocol to provide secure, wireless and direct push synchronization of corporate e-mail, attachments, contacts, and calendar. Easily set up your account today!
Please register your software with DataViz now. This process entitles you to product update notifications, online support resources and exclusive promotions from DataViz.
Please note: DataViz will not sell or distribute this information.
Email is not valid. Please enter it again.
The registration server is not available or busy. Please try again at a later time.
An error occurred while attempting to connect to the internet. Please make sure your APN settings, firewall settings, and application permissions are configured appropriately.
An error occurred while attempting registration. Please try again at a later time.

An error occurred while attempting registration. Please check your registration information and confirm it is correct. Select the Details button to see information specific to what caused the problem.

This application uses the Microsoft® Exchange ActiveSync® protocol to provide secure, wireless and direct push synchronization of corporate e-mail, contacts and attachments.

You can access additional features such as calendar synchronization, contact photos, global address list lookup, and message flagging by purchasing unlock keys through Android Market and our online store.

Easily set up your account today!
The feature you are trying to access is included in the full version of this application.
